The 9th Gaudí Awards ceremony, presented by the Catalan Film Academy, was held at the  complex in Barcelona on 29 January 2017. The gala was hosted by Bruno Oro.
Background
The nominations were read by Miranda Gas and Francesc Orella from La Pedrera on 29 December 2016. The awards ceremony took place on 29 January 2017 and it was hosted by . It featured musical performances by Els Amics de les Arts, Sopa de Cabra, and Marina Rossell.
